tool_description: Optimizes portfolio allocation using modern portfolio theory and advanced optimization techniques to maximize risk-adjusted returns.

expected_returns.description: Expected annual returns for each asset

risk_aversion.description: Risk aversion parameter (1-10, higher = more risk averse)

min_weights.description: Minimum weight constraints for each asset

max_weights.description: Maximum weight constraints for each asset

correlation_lookback.description: Days of historical data for correlation estimation

rebalancing_frequency.description: Expected rebalancing frequency: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

error_messages: Array length mismatch: asset_universe and expected_returns must have the same length.
Risk aversion out of range: risk_aversion must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid optimization objective: Use max_sharpe, min_volatility, or max_return.
Invalid weight constraints: min_weights and max_weights must have same length as asset_universe and be between 0 and 1.
Infeasible optimization: Weight constraints make the optimization problem infeasible.
Insufficient return data: Unable to estimate expected returns for some assets.
usage: Provide asset_universe and expected_returns arrays with risk_aversion level. Configure optimization_objective and optional constraints. Returns optimal portfolio weights and performance metrics.

optimal_weights.description: Optimal allocation weights for each asset

sharpe_ratio.description: Expected Sharpe ratio of optimized portfolio
